venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
Meetup with other Lowell area socially progressive Christians from 11:45am-1:15pm on Sunday, June 27th at Christ Church United, UCC in Lowell. Childcare is provided during our meeting.

This is our first session for our Summer semester. Our summer schedule is to meet every other week from 11:45am-1:15pm until Aug. 22 (6/27, 7/11, 7/25, 8/8, 8/22). If Sundays don't work for you, two other Progressive Christians' groups meet on Saturday mornings (8:00am-9:30am) and Thursday nights (6:45pm-8:15pm). For more info. on the Saturday & Thursday groups, contact Chris (http://www.meetup.com...)

If you are able, come to Christ Church United, UCC's 10am worship service (http://WeWelcomeAll.o...) prior to our progressive Christians' meetup. Quality nursery care and engaging Christian Education classes for children grades K-12 are available during the 10am service.
item.name: Grtr Lowell Progressive Christians Meetup
